hero.headline: Connect with Skilled Craftsmen Across Egypt
hero.subheadline: Find trusted professionals for your projects or showcase your skills to potential clients. Join our growing community of craftsmen and clients.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple steps to connect craftsmen with clients. Whether you need work done or want to offer your services, our platform makes it easy.

testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied clients and craftsmen who trust our platform for their projects.

testimonial1.name: Sarah Ahmed
testimonial1.content: Found an excellent electrician through this platform. Professional, punctual, and did a fantastic job with my home wiring. Highly recommend!

testimonial2.name: Mohammed Hassan
testimonial2.content: This platform has helped me find consistent work and build my client base. The payment system is secure and the support team is very helpful.

testimonial3.name: Fatima Ali
testimonial3.content: I needed urgent plumbing repairs for my restaurant. Found a reliable plumber within hours and the work was completed professionally.

verified.title: Verified Profiles
verified.description: All craftsmen are verified and background-checked for your safety

secure.title: Secure Payments
secure.description: Your payments are protected with bank-level security

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Our support team is always here to help you

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Experience?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied clients and skilled craftsmen who are already part of our growing community. Whether you need quality work done or want to showcase your expertise, we've got you covered.

trust.footer: Join our community today and experience the difference quality craftsmanship makes
